script.name: Show LLDP Ports Statistics
script.comments: Factory script to print LLDP port statistics for selected ports
script.content: ################################################################ # System scripting.Script # # scripting.Script : Get LLDP port details # Revision : 1.0 # Last updated : 01/05/2008 # Purpose : Displays LLDP port statistics for selected ports # ################################################################ show lldp ports $port stat
script.creator: system
